function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Customers gathering around food trucks may facilitate the spread of contagious diseases.","Impact":"Increase in the number of COVID-19 cases and potential exposure to other contagious diseases.","Mitigation":"Implement strict social distancing measures and hygiene protocols around food truck areas.","Technologies":"Contactless payment systems, online ordering apps, and crowd management technology.","People":"Customers, food truck operators, and nearby residents.","Owner":"Local health authorities and food truck operators."},{"Description":"Customers sharing food-related experiences in person and online may contribute to the spread of contagious diseases.","Impact":"Increased social interaction leading to potential transmission of contagious diseases.","Mitigation":"Encourage and promote virtual sharing of experiences, and educate customers on safe social distancing practices.","Technologies":"Social media platforms for virtual sharing, and educational campaigns on public health guidelines.","People":"Customers, social media users, and community members.","Owner":"Food truck operators, public health agencies, and community leaders."}]}
